ygData.subject: Re: Vampiric Curse
ygData.msgSnippet: Karana plains are a good place for a necro to solo and group at that level ... ... -- ... Q: who said No one will ever need more than 640k of memory - A:
ygData.messageBody:
Karana plains are a good place for a necro to solo and group at that
level ...

Mata wrote:

> I don't think the fact that you get life after the MOB is dead is a
> bug . .. it's like this . . . If a MOB has 10 life left and you siphon
> life you still get 70 health out of it, it is the same idea of
> though. If the spell goes . . . you get the full goo. ;-) P.S.
> Where is a good place for a L22 Necro to hunt? Anyone?

--
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Q: who said "No one will ever need more than 640k of memory"
-
A: Bill Gates 1974 - That was his response when asked about the memory
limit in
his DOS program.

........this limit is still being used today in all MicroSoft operating
systems.

dont forget to visit my site at http://lucindrea.com
